TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SplitterEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for and the events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户移动控件时发生此事件 。The event occurs when the user is moving the control. 当用户完成移动控件时发生此事件 。The event occurs when the user finishes moving the control. 类指定鼠标指针的位置以及控件左上角的位置 。The class specifies the position of the mouse pointer and the position of the upper-left corner of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `SplitContainer1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#548)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#548)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 引发和事件时，可以将此属性与此类的属性一起使用，以确定控件的位置 。You can use this property along with the property of this class to determine the position of the control when the and events are raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `SplitContainer1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在引发和事件时，可以将此属性与此类的属性一起使用， 以确定鼠标指针的 当前位置 。You can use this property along with the property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the and events are raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `SplitContainer1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
